skills.Name: Servitor Wind Walk
skills.Description: Increases the servitor's Speed by 20 for 20 minutes.

skills.Name: Sword/Blunt Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 1.5 when using a sword or blunt weapon.

skills.Name: Heavy Armor Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 20.5 and decreases received Critical Damage by 15% when equipped with heavy armor.

skills.Name: M. Def.
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 24.

skills.Name: Shield Mastery
skills.Description: Shield Defense + 50% and Defense Rate + 85%. Additional P. Def. + 81 when equipped with Heavy Armor.

skills.Name: Judgment
skills.Description: Douse your weapon in Unholy energies to deal 460 Dark Physical Damage. Reduces weapon resistance for 30 seconds.

skills.Name: Gust Blade
skills.Description: Attacks nearby targets with 345 Physical Damage. Can be used while a sword/dualsword/blunt weapon is equipped. Over-hit. Critical.

skills.Name: Shield Strike
skills.Description: Attacks the enemy using a shield with 510 Physical Power. Requires a shield.

skills.Name: Superior Aggression
skills.Description: Provokes the target to attack with 6600 Power.

skills.Name: Energetic Yell
skills.Description: Yell with energetic vigor, aggravating the target for 4000 Power and regains 25%% MP.

skills.Name: Aggression Aura
skills.Description: Provokes nearby enemies to attack with 4544 Power.

skills.Name: Shield Impact
skills.Description: Attacks the selected target with 100 power added to P. Atk. and inflicts Stun for 5 seconds. Requires a shield.

skills.Name: Life Leech
skills.Description: Conjure dark fangs to sink into your targets body, dealing 72 Magical Damage and healing for 480.

skills.Name: Summon Dark Panther
skills.Description: Summons a dark panther that attacks with dexterity. Requires 1 C-grade Crystal(s).

skills.Name: Hamstring
skills.Description: Decreases the enemy's Speed by 60%% for 10 seconds.

skills.Name: Servitor Wind Walk
skills.Description: Increases the servitor's Speed by 20 for 20 minutes.

skills.Name: Recall Pet
skills.Description: Teleports your pet(s) to your location.
